#Here we put all the specs of the script/program

= Introduction =

Our objective is to make a installer-> cydia repository conversor and automated repository manager for cydia repositories

= Usage = 

svn co http://debicizer.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ 

go to scripts and put the xml files of the repo/s you want to convert

cd scripts

wget modmyifone.com/installer.xml

wget hhttp://iphone.sleepers.net/repo.xml


wget http://limitededitioniphone.com/lei.xml


wget http://apptapp.saurik.com/alpha.xml

goto directory zips and launch debian script for conversion

./debian firstrun installer.xml "ModMyiFone.com"

./debian firstrun repo.xml "bigboss"

./debian firstrun lei.xml "bigboss"

./debian firstrun alpha.xml "saurik"
